_meanings:
{@--2@} Congruity or 
fitness, as one of the several 
circumstances which determine the exact
meaning of a word in a sentence
(such as {#saMyoga, viyoga#} &c.);  
{#sAmarTyamOcitI deSaH kAlo vyaktiH svarAdayaH#} <ls>S. D. 2</ls>;
in the example {#pAtu vo dayitAmuKaM#} there
is {#OcitI#} or fitness in taking {#muKa#} to
mean {#sAMmuKyaM#} (meeting) instead of
{#AnanaM#}.
